item.title: LLM Project | AKAbrief
item.description:
App | AKAbrief Link to heading

AKAbrief allows you to upload PDFs, automatically summarize key information, and get answers in seconds.

It streamlines tasks that would otherwise take hours, üëâ especially for digitalized documents not compatible with general AI platforms.

Check out the AKABRIEF app by clicking on the image.

item.title: LLM Project | AKAquery
item.description:
App | AKAquery Link to heading

AKAquery is designed to improve your efficiency in navigating regulatory frameworks like #IFRS17 and hashtag#SolvencyII.

It provides precise answers to legislative questions ‚Äî such as identifying which LoB or segment falls under unemployment coverage.

Check out the AKAquery app by clicking on the image.

item.title: ML Project | Credit Default Model
item.description:
Klarna | Supervised Learning Case Link to heading

The goal is to predict clients’ probability of default based on their historical purchase patterns at klarna.

The final prediction will be displayed on a web interface, simply click on the image to view it.

For more details about the project, consult the slides.

item.title: DP Project | Solar Forecasting Project
item.description:
Solar Forecasting Link to heading

We have created a deep-learning model for solar irradiance forecasting. According to the literature, the hybrid model of CNN-LSTM offers the best results, therefore, we implemented this combination, and we were able to produce predictions from 15 min up to 1 hour. Further details are on GitHub.

Contributions üí™ Link to heading

  • Feature analysis
    • Solar Azimuth and Solar Zenith features analysis
  • Model development
    • I helped along with other colleagues to create and develop the model
    • We have a hybrid model of CNN-LSTM running on the Google Cloud Platform - Cloud Storage.
  • You can watch the project‚Äôs presentation, 22‚Äô11‚Äô‚Äô here
  • Additionally, you can the slides presentation is available here
